title: MD
biography: Vasanthapuram Ravi is a leading specialist in Neurovirology - Viral encephalitis at NIMHANS.
aiSummary: Vasanthapuram Ravi is a neurovirology - viral encephalitis specialist with an H-index of 110 at NIMHANS (Faculty). Has been published in Nature Methods, Journal of the Neurological Sciences. Based in India.
